content.rendered:
Home / About

The SENSO Story

Beauty is about enhancing what you have. Let yourself shine through.

Introducing Valerie Terletskiy, SENSO founder and natural rejuvenation expert

Valerie Terletskiy has a deep understanding of aging and facial massage. In her early 40s, she experienced unexpectedly fast-progressing signs of age and had to grapple with an evolving sense of self. This personal journey is the source of the passion that fuels SENSO, with the aim of helping others feel beautiful in their own skin, too.

 

When exploring safe, non-surgical, and non-invasive ways to look younger and feel rejuvenated, Valerie found face massage – and it was love at first touch. Over five years of research and intense practice, she created FaceBioLift, a unique combination of anti-aging massage techniques that improves muscle tone, smoothes lines and wrinkles, and boosts overall skin health. 


Today, SENSO Skin Experts offers a range of innovative anti-age treatments that bring instantly noticeable results. Start your journey to natural beauty by booking your treatment today.
